title: SimChat Entity Config
description: Schema for SimChat entity configuration files in config/simchat/entities/<entityId>.json

name.description: Default display name for this entity (used when dialogue doesn't specify entityName)

subtitle.description: Default subtitle for this entity (e.g., company, title)

avatar.description: Avatar ID to use (defaults to entityId). Loads from config/simchat/avatars/<avatar>.png
